title: BRIEF-J.C. Flowers, Cerberus Have Agreed To Buy HSH Nordbank For Up To 1 Bln Euros - WSJ
text: February 22, 2018 / 3:02 PM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-J.C. Flowers, Cerberus Have Agreed To Buy HSH Nordbank For Up To 1 Bln Euros - WSJ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 22 (Reuters) - * J.C. FLOWERS & CO. AND CERBERUS CAPITAL HAVE AGREED TO BUY GERMAN LENDER HSH NORDBANK FOR UP TO â‚¬1 BILLION ($1.2 BILLION) -WSJ CITING SOURCES * HSH TO KEEP $5 BILLION-$6 BILLION SHIPPING PORTFOLIO AFTER SALE-WSJ CITING SOURCES Source text: on.wsj.com/2sLRKvd Further company coverage:
